summary: I originally asked Mkenny95 to make this same mod for me because I was having trouble with the dark face bug, but after I got it working I decided to put Sarah on here myself. Here's the one Mkenny95 did http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53464/?
descriptionHtml:
Sarah Winter is located in The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold. She comes from my story I have written called "Sarah" and you can read it here http://planetraeth.wikia.com/wiki/Sarah if you want to know her background.

Install: Use Nexus or just drag files in Data folder.

If you want her to look the way she does in the picture, I use:
UNP BLESSED BODY mod - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

If you want, add pictures of her from your game.

Required:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Credit:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

XP32 - UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT
author: Wolfknight777
